Sidebar layout for write_delim module

These functions return the ui elements for a side panel and a main panel.

write_delim_sidebar_side(id)

write_delim_sidebar_main(id)

Arguments

id
character, used to identify a namespace

Value

a shiny::tagList containing UI elements

Details

The side elements are the inputs; the main elements are the outputs.

Examples

library("shiny")
shinyUI(
  fluidPage(
    shinyjs::useShinyjs(),
    sidebarLayout(
      sidebarPanel(write_delim_sidebar_side("foo")),
      mainPanel(write_delim_sidebar_main("foo"))
    )
  )
)
#> <div class="container-fluid">
#>   <div class="row">
#>     <div class="col-sm-4">
#>       <form class="well">
#>         <div class="form-group shiny-input-container">
#>           <label class="control-label" for="foo-delim">Delimiter</label>
#>           <div>
#>             <select id="foo-delim" class="form-control"><option value="," selected>Comma</option>
#> <option value=";">Semicolon</option>
#> <option value="	">Tab</option></select>
#>             <script type="application/json" data-for="foo-delim">{}</script>
#>           </div>
#>         </div>
#>         <div class="form-group shiny-input-container">
#>           <label for="foo-file">Filename</label>
#>           <input id="foo-file" type="text" class="form-control" value="data.csv"/>
#>         </div>
#>         <a id="foo-download" class="btn btn-default shiny-download-link btn-primary" href="" target="_blank">
#>           <i class="fa fa-download"></i>
#>           Download
#>         </a>
#>       </form>
#>     </div>
#>     <div class="col-sm-8">
#>       <pre style="overflow: auto; word-wrap: normal; white-space: pre;" id="foo-status" class="shiny-html-output"></pre>
#>       <pre style="overflow: auto; word-wrap: normal; white-space: pre;" id="foo-text_data" class="shiny-html-output"></pre>
#>       <pre style="overflow: auto; word-wrap: normal; white-space: pre;" id="foo-text_preview" class="shiny-html-output"></pre>
#>     </div>
#>   </div>
#> </div>
